verses.text: “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w come|strong="H6635"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*—\w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w delight|strong="H2655"\w*—\w see|strong="H2009"\w*, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w His|strong="H3526"\w* coming? \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w appears|strong="H7200"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H6884"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refiner|strong="H6884"\w*’s fire, \w like|strong="H6884"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* launderer’s \w soap|strong="H1287"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refiner|strong="H6884"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w purifier|strong="H2891"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w purify|strong="H2891"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w refine|strong="H6884"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w please|strong="H6149"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w*.

“\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w draw|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* perjurers, \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w oppressors|strong="H6231"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* widowed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w defraud|strong="H5186"\w* laborers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deny \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w Me|strong="H3372"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w change|strong="H8138"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3615"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*. \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. “\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* ask, ‘\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*?’

\w Will|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w rob|strong="H6906"\w* God? \w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w robbing|strong="H6906"\w* \w Me|strong="H3588"\w*! \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ask, ‘\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w rob|strong="H6906"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*?’ \w In|strong="H4643"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w and|strong="H4643"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* cursed \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H3994"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*—\w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w still|strong="H1471"\w* \w robbing|strong="H6906"\w* \w Me|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* storehouse, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w food|strong="H2964"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. Test \w Me|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. “See \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* windows \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* pour \w out|strong="H7324"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* measure.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* devourer \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w produce|strong="H6529"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* call \w you|strong="H3588"\w* blessed, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H2388"\w* harsh,” \w says|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* ask, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*?’

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* futile \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* gained \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* requirements \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w mournfully|strong="H6941"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*?

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* call \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w arrogant|strong="H2086"\w* blessed. \w Not|strong="H6213"\w* \w only|strong="H1571"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evildoers|strong="H6213"\w* prosper, \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* test God \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*.’”

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scroll|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w* regarding \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* honored \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

“\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* Mine,” says \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, “\w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w treasured|strong="H5459"\w* \w possession|strong="H5459"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w spares|strong="H2550"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w serves|strong="H5647"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w distinguish|strong="H7200"\w* between \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, between those \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* those \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w do|strong="H5647"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.”
